resources.string: Can not connect to the server, check for an Internet connection and try again.
The server does not respond to the request. Check your internet connection and try again.

Post tags page get items error:
You`ve already liked this post a few times. Please try another one.
You have already voted in a similar way.
The server did not accept the request! Reason ({0}) {0}
{0} BadRequest. (The server cannot or will not process the request due to an apparent client error.)
{0} Forbidden. (The request was valid, but the server is refusing action. Try to log in.)
{0} NotFound. (The requested resource could not be found but may be available in the future.)
{0} InternalServerError. (A generic error message, given when an unexpected condition was encountered and no more specific message is suitable.)
{0} BadGateway. (The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and received an invalid response from the upstream server)
{statusCode} GatewayTimeout. (The server was acting as a gateway or proxy and did not receive a timely response from the upstream server. Try repeat request a little later.)
The key you\'ve entered is not a private posting key. If you\'re not able to sign in this [video] (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XAVapBwbS1U) might be helpful.
